artifact.snippet: Design theme: Tech Pioneer (Midnight Blue #020617, Electric Blue #38bdf8). Glassmorphism controls. Floating Mode Toggle for switching between Doc/PPT.

artifact.title: Architecture
artifact.snippet: Uses vuepress-plugin-md-enhance (presentation/reveal). Integration Points: Doc â†” PPT buttons, mapped paths. Implementation Patterns: Unified styles in index.css.

research.title: Web Presentation & Glassmorphism Design Trends (2025)
research.findings: - **Glassmorphism 2.0**: Frosted glass effects (backdrop-filter: blur) with subtle borders (1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.1)) are standard for overlay controls to maintain context without blocking content. - **Dark Mode Presentation**: High contrast text (White on Deep Blue) reduces eye strain and looks premium. Neon accents (Electric Blue) guide focus. - **Micro-interactions**: Hover states on controls should have a subtle glow or lift (transform: translateY) to indicate interactivity. - **Mobile Swipe**: For mobile, standard tap arrows are outdated. Swipe gestures (built-in to reveal.js) are preferred. - **Linear App Inspiration**: Clean typography, minimal UI chrome, high performance transitions. "Tech Pioneer" theme aligns with Linear's dark mode aesthetic.
research.references: - "Dark Mode and Glass Morphism: The Hottest UI Trends in 2025" (Medium) - "Linear web app UI screen examples" (Nicelydone) - Reveal.js documentation on custom controls and layouts

artifact.reason: Where vuepress-plugin-md-enhance needs to be configured.
Contains global CSS variables (--c-bg, --c-brand) that reveal.js theme must inherit.

constraints.constraint: Must use 'Midnight Blue' (#020617) background for slides to match homepage.
Controls must use Glassmorphism to float above slides without obscuring content.
Mobile experience must remain readable (minScale adjustment in reveal.js config).
Navigation buttons must handle path mapping logic reliably (Doc path to Slide path).

tests.standards: Verify reveal.js initializes correctly on slide pages. Check that custom theme overrides default reveal.js styles (background, fonts). Verify navigation links work in both directions.

ideas.idea: Test slide transition animations (slide vs fade).
Verify deep linking (refreshing a slide URL keeps you on that slide).
